## Group Member Locations

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

from ipyleaflet import Map, Marker, AwesomeIcon
from ipywidgets import HTML

# Create a map centered on Texas (between Houston and Austin)
m = Map(center=(30.0, -96.5), zoom=6)

# Example locations - these can be updated with actual member locations
locations = [
    {
        "name": "Jacob K. McPherson",
        "role": "Principal Investigator",
        "lat": 29.7174,
        "lon": -95.4018,
        "city": "Houston, TX"
    }
]

# Add markers for each location
for loc in locations:
    icon = AwesomeIcon(
        name='user',
        marker_color='blue',
        icon_color='white'
    )
    marker = Marker(
        location=(loc["lat"], loc["lon"]),
        draggable=False,
        title=f"{loc['name']} - {loc['role']}",
        icon=icon
    )
    marker.popup = HTML(
        value=f"<b>{loc['name']}</b><br>{loc['role']}<br>{loc['city']}"
    )
    m.add_layer(marker)

m
```
